mapper.select: SELECT W.WORDID, WORDWORD, WORDFURIGANA, WORDMEAN, WORDLEVEL, EXFRONTJP, EXBACKJP, EXFRONTKR, EXBACKKR FROM ( SELECT O.WORDID, WORDWORD, WORDFURIGANA, WORDMEAN, WORDLEVEL, WORDREGISTERDATE, WORDUPDATEDATE FROM T_WORD O LEFT JOIN T_ENDWORD N ON O.WORDID = N.WORDID WHERE USERID != #{userId} OR USERID IS NULL ) W JOIN T_EX E ON W.WORDID = E.WORDID WHERE W.WORDLEVEL = #{wordLevel} ORDER BY W.WORDID
